scripts.build: tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist/output.css && cp index.html dist/ && cp lib/repoWidget.js dist/
scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon --watch index.html --watch lib/repoWidget.js --exec 'cp index.html dist/ && cp lib/repoWidget.js dist/'" "npm run watch" "browser-sync start --server 'dist' --files 'dist/**/*'"
